title: Human metapneumovirus infection is associated with a substantial morbidity and mortality burden in adult inpatients
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Quentin Philippot, Blandine Rammaert, Gaëlle Dauriat, Cédric Daubin, Frédéric Schlemmer, Adrien Costantini, Yacine Tandjaoui-Lambiotte, Mathilde Neuville, Emmanuelle Desrochettes, Alexis Ferré, Laetitia Bodet Contentin, François-Xavier Lescure, Bruno Megarbane, Antoine Belle, Jean Dellamonica, Sylvain Jaffuel, Jean-Luc Meynard, Jonathan Messika, Nicolas Lau, Nicolas Terzi
